Row.Text: Combat victories provide [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.(on Standard Speed) Inquisitors can Remove Heresy one extra time.

Automatically receive the final [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet already). +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_Food] Food from Hills. Koshin Tower provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if adjacent to an Aqueduct.

Can capture defeated enemy civilization combat units and convert them to Builders. +25% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ranged units. When you capture a Barbarian Outpost, receive a Tribal Village reward in addition to the usual [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Industrial Zone and Entertainment Complex districts in half the time. One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government. Each Archaeological Museum holds 6 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts instead of 3, and can support 2 Archaeologists at once. Archaeological Museums are automatically themed when they have 6 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts.

Zunko Tohoku unique building that replaces Water Mill. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production, +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [ICON_RESOURCE_COFFEE] Coffee resources and [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea resources gain +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture each. [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] Sugar, [ICON_RESOURCE_SALT] Salt, [ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] Rice gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food each. Can be build along the river.
Zunko Tohoku unique building: Zunda Cafe

Itako Tohoku unique unit. this unit has the same class and the similer promotions as Warrior Monk. Pushes defending enemy units back from their hex in any battle where they score more damage. Defenders that cannot retreat suffer additional damage. Shrine is required to produce this unit.
Itako Tohoku unique unit: Fighting Monk

Itako Tohoku unique Renaissance era unit that replaces the Musketman. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when there is a Missionary, Inquisitor, or Apostle in the same hex. If this unit captures a city or is adjacent to a city when it is captured, the city will automatically adopt the Conquistador player's Religion as the dominant Religion. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged. Temple is required to produce this unit.
Zunko Tohoku unique unit: Zunda House Archer
Zunko Tohoku unique Classical era unit. Ranged unit with 4 [ICON_Movement] Movement with a [ICON_Range] Range of 2. Can capture defeated enemy civilization combat units and convert them to Builders.

A district unique to Kiritan Tohoku for religious activity. Replaces the Holy Site district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points, +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point, +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point, +1 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant point. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each adjacent Forest and other District.
Itako Tohoku unique District: Namahage Museum
A district unique to Kiritan Tohoku. Replaces the Neighborhood district. Provides +5 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +2 [ICON_Production] Production for adjacent Industrial Zone District.
Kiritan Tohoku unique District: Industrial Park

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Koshin Tower, unique to Democratic People's Republic Tohoku.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each adjacent Mine and Quarry. Cannot be built on Hills.
Democratic People's Republic Tohoku unique improvement: Koshin Tower
